glsa.title: nginx: Information disclosure
glsa.synopsis: An SSL session fixation vulnerability in nginx may allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information.

background.p: nginx is a robust, small, and high performance HTTP and reverse proxy server.

description.p: An SSL session fixation vulnerability has been found in nginx when multiple servers use the same shared ssl_session_cache or ssl_session_ticket_key.

impact.p: A remote attacker may be able to obtain sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
